topics.body:
it takes balls to pull a trigger, and if you've told someone that you're considering it than you don't have the will to do it

coming from someone who's suicidal, you guys should probs trust me on this
topics.author: 50a843d47f123b2e7c001359

topics.body:
"@mariomarc":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5598c18f6368720b4e000a03#post_5598c18f6368720b4e000a03
Well, maybe it's in my damn personality.
You don't even know how she treats my family.
You don't. At all.
topics.author: 5446fcfc6368723ec21a0000

topics.body:
"@Carcass Strife":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5598c13063687250750014a1#post_5598c13063687250750014a1
And dude, if this isn't her first time behaving like this then she needs professional help.
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff

topics.body:
"@hype":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5598c1d56368725082001481#post_5598c1d56368725082001481

Dude, the entire "if you tell people you're going to commit suicide you won't actually do it" myth has been proven untrue countless times. Maybe it's true for you, but it certainly isn't for a large portion of the mentally ill.

[spoiler]why do i say dude so much[/spoiler]

"@Carcass Strife":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5598c1ef63687250900011b4#post_5598c1ef63687250900011b4

All that matters now is that she's safe.

This isn't the time nor place for a fight like this, either of you.
topics.author: 5041b54f7f123b77af00a442

topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5598c1f963687250900011bc#post_5598c1f963687250900011bc
She did. It didn't help.
She went to the hospital, she still does this.
She even went to jail.
topics.author: 5446fcfc6368723ec21a0000

topics.body:
"@mariomarc":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5598c18f6368720b4e000a03#post_5598c18f6368720b4e000a03
Let's be fair. Someone probably wouldn't care if someone actually did say she wanted to commit suicide, but then it turns out she's lying. But on that note, it's disgusting to say that you want to commit suicide for attention.
topics.author: 554d477e63687270dee30600

topics.body:
"@And Brother I Hurt People":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5598c2286368720b4e000a8b#post_5598c2286368720b4e000a8b
well it's true for me and true for the dude i talk to like everyday that actually has put a gun to his head for 20 minutes

plus with it out in the open she'll get help and persuaded to change her mind anyway so there's _really_ no reason to freak out over it
topics.author: 50a843d47f123b2e7c001359

oh yeah

i guess i'm projecting pretty hard, eh?
topics.author: 50a843d47f123b2e7c001359

topics.body:
Okay, I'm going to ask a general question to you, Carcass. Do you want us to drop this subject? If your sister is safe, there's no reason to expose you to this constant discomfort. I'm afraid that this is going to boil into something more than the thread can handle.

"@hype":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5598c302636872506b0019ee#post_5598c302636872506b0019ee

Meh, it's fine. We all do it.
topics.author: 5041b54f7f123b77af00a442

topics.body:
"@And Brother I Hurt People":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5598c30c6368720b4e000b68#post_5598c30c6368720b4e000b68
My problem is, in those kind of situations, I don't have a brain. I just don't know what to say or what to do at all, and if I say something, it makes it worse.
Let's drop it.
topics.author: 5446fcfc6368723ec21a0000

topics.body:
"@Carcass Strife":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5598c38363687250900013ce#post_5598c38363687250900013ce

Can do.
